string-array.name: routing_mode
string-array.item: Bypassing the LAN address then proxy
Bypassing LAN and mainland address then proxy

resources.string: First use of this feature, please use the app to add server
This application is not licensed nor valid. Please download the app from a trusted source.
If a VPN connection is active on device shutdown, try to reconnect it on reboot
If you have customized your device in any way (rooting, ROM, Xposed) please note the changes below:
Unfortunately your Android device does not have proper VpnService support. If you click OK we will report this to the vendor, but they may or may not fix the bug.
Enable support for MD5 signatures of X509 certificates. Note that MD5 is broken and should not be used

The certificate from VPN server "%1$s" failed verification.

Reason: "%2$s"
SHA1: %3$s

Connect anyway?

Status changes of the SocksHttp connection (Connecting, authenticating,…)
SocksHttp connection requires a user input, e.g. two factor authentification
How long should VPN try to connect before giving up?
Config uses option tls-remote that was deprecated in 2.3 and finally removed in 2.4
Lost KeyChain association with profile certificate and private key. Please retry login.
Cannot obtain profile certificate from KeyChain
Error connecting to host \'%1$s\'. See log for details.
Enabling this option can sometimes help when connecting to legacy servers.
"Use Google DNS servers as a fallback for connections that route all internet traffic through the VPN tunnel but don't define any VPN DNS servers"
To create a shortcut to this profile or access the profile context menu (for rename, delete, etc.), touch the edit icon on the right. To switch to a different profile, tap the profile name briefly.

Some versions of Android 4.1 have problems if the name of the keystore certificate contains non alphanumeric characters (like spaces, underscores or dashes). Try to reimport the certificate without special characters

Cannot access the Android Keychain Certificates. This can be caused by a firmware upgrade or by restoring a backup of the app/app settings. Please edit the VPN and reselect the certificate under basic settings to recreate the permission to access the certificate.
Missing user certificate or user certifcate key file
VPN credentials required but none provided
You must select a CA certificate
You must select a User certificate
Welcome to VPN. VPN requires a .ovpn profile to connect to a server. Please go to Menu / Import to import a profile or Menu / Help for more information.
Pause VPN when screen is blanked
Your Secure and Private Path to the Internet
Conflicts with one that is already connected
Error reading multiple files referenced by profile
Error reading file referenced by profile
Profile is too large (cannot exceed %d bytes)

You need to define and enable at least one remote server.

By proceeding, you are giving the application permission to completely control OpenConnect for Android and to intercept all network traffic. Do NOT accept unless you trust the application. Otherwise, you run the risk of having your data compromised by malicious software."
Please select PKCS#12 file to import
If I activate the Records they will be deleted automatically.
If active there will be no delays between requests, which can improve ping or even the speed of the connection.
If active, redirect requests to the remote server. If not, DNS will be used by the local system.
Redirection was activated for the remote server. If not, UDP wont work.
The higher the number of Threads, the higher the power consumption and the connection speed on your device.
Whether to delete the configuration file requires a second confirmation by the user
local DNS returns fake IP address (faster, but it may not work for some apps)
Feedback enhancements or bugs to GitHub

General: Checked App is proxy, unchecked direct connection; \nbypass mode: checked app directly connected, unchecked proxy. \nThe option to automatically select the proxy application in the menu

Other devices can connect to proxy by your ip address through socks/http, Only enable in trusted network to avoid unauthorized connection
Try sniff domain from the packet (default on)
Display default current speed in the notification.\nNotification icon would change based on usage.
Open the camera to scan immediately at startup, otherwise you can choose to scan the code or select a photo in the toolbar
Enable it if youre having trouble sharing your devices internet.
